mapper.select: SELECT c.f_user_id, c.f_community_id, c.f_machine_id, c.f_title, c.f_content, c.f_date, t_agree.agreeNum, t_disagree.disagreeNum, t.f_is_agree FROM t_community c INNER JOIN (select f_community_id, count(t_community_disposition.f_community_id) agreeNum from t_community_disposition where t_community_disposition.f_is_agree = 1 group by f_community_id) t_agree ON c.f_community_id = t_agree.f_community_id AND c.f_machine_id = #{machineId} INNER JOIN (select f_community_id, count(t_community_disposition.f_community_id) disagreeNum from t_community_disposition where t_community_disposition.f_is_agree = -1 group by f_community_id) t_disagree ON c.f_community_id = t_disagree.f_community_id AND c.f_machine_id = #{machineId} LEFT JOIN (select * from t_community_disposition where f_user_id = #{userId} ) t on c.f_community_id = t.f_community_id;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_community_disposition (f_community_id, f_user_id, f_is_agree) VALUES (#{communityId}, #{userId}, #{isAgree});

INSERT INTO t_community (f_community_id, f_user_id, f_machine_id, f_title, f_content, f_date, f_is_del) VALUES (#{community.communityId}, #{userId}, #{machineId}, #{community.title}, #{community.content}, #{community.date}, 0)
